root: ^Marina, I'll just get straight to the point. It's quite clear that you we're the culprit.
^The evidence is clear, you drugged Evelyn under the guise of helping her sleep. But you weren’t just there as a bystander. You were involved when she died.
^I didn’t want this! It wasn’t supposed to go this far! I just... I just wanted her to sign over the estate... but Victor— he—
^It was Victor... He said it would be fine. That we’d just scare her into signing it, but when she refused... he killed her. He killed her, and I stayed. I—I helped him clean up.
^She’s lying! She was the one who wanted to push Evelyn, to force her into signing. I never wanted any of this! She helped clean up, she helped cover everything up!
^[What is even going on right now?]
^So you were both there. You couldn’t control her, so you killed her. Marina might have helped clean up, but the murder was yours wasn't it, Victor?
^[I'm... definately getting a coffee after this]
^Alright, I think I've just about heard enough.
